summary: A player home located between Ivarstead and High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml:
Temple of Merith is a player home located within the Aldmer Ruins; a new location on the path from Ivarstead to High Hrothgar. It was previously known as Aldmer Stronghold.

Features:

+ A modest and follower friendly underground ruin, restored as a functioning player home.
+ An armory with 16 weapon racks, 3 plaques, a large chest and plenty of shelving.
+ A serene glacial hot spring beside the lower foundations of your home.
+ A breathtaking view from the tallest mountain in Skyrim, from your very own balcony; which also features it\'s very own archery range.
+ For all your crafting needs; a workbench, anvil, tanning rack, grindstone, alchemy lab, enchanters table and forge.
+ A warm and cosy atmosphere.
+ Merith\'s Journal.

[youtube]hq3ZlsT8zZw&list=HL1365473758&feature=mh_lolz[/youtube]

Q&A:

[color=#ADFF2F]I can\'t find the mod in my file list?[/color]
The file is named Aldmer Ruins.

[color=#ADFF2F]Are you updating this mod?[/color]
Constantly.

[color=#ADFF2F]Where is the key to the safe?[/color]
In your bedroom, on your bedside table.

[color=#ADFF2F]Can I edit your mod?[/color]
Absolutely! If you republish, please credit me as the original designer. Thank-you.
author: PMB

files.name: Temple of Merith
files.changelogHtml:
Complete lighting overhall.
Smelter has been added to the Falls.
The balcony has been redecorated, now feating a chopping block among other things.
The armory has been made into a cell of its own and has been stocked up! Now features a mannequin!
More clutter! Added a bookshelf, lighting to the Falls, two new player chests and lots of little things.
